locations.name: Wolf Ford
locations.description: A small village and the starting location of the game. The witcher arrives here to take contracts from villagers and learn about the Shadow Realm and its dangers.

locations.name: Forest of Shadows
locations.description: A dark and mysterious forest surrounding Wolf Ford. It is home to weaker monsters and hides many secrets about the spreading evil.

locations.name: The Swamp
locations.description: A dangerous and hostile area hidden deep within the Forest of Shadows. A powerful swamp witch lives here and knows the location of the legendary silver sword.

locations.name: Ancient Walls
locations.description: Old ruins discovered after exploring the swamp. These crumbling walls hide the legendary silver sword needed to defeat the Lord of Shadows.

locations.name: Black Fortress
locations.description: The final location of the game. A dark fortress where the Lord of Shadows resides and where the final battle takes place.
